products.title: Rimini, Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: The pretty vintage of the rimini rose provides a strikingly elegant look, its dusky pink hue giving any room a warm, rosy glow. The long-lasting, resilient fabric has a smooth, effortless finish, allowing light to gently penetrate through. This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in primrose combines a best-in-class light-controlling blackout fabric with a rich, vivid yellow colouring; perfect for bringing the feel of sunshine in even when you need to block it out. This primrose colouring will brighten up any room. Consider the rimini in primrose as an addition to a white or pastel coloured landing or hallway, to add a splash of colour without the need to totally redecorate.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Blush Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Who doesn't love a touch of blush pink? It's the natural shade that reminds you of home and welcomes you through the door the moment you take out your keys. If you love subtle colour that adds depth and clarity then you need look no further. When you want to add something a little more gentle to your window spaces that disperses natural colour around the room there's perhaps no better choice than trinity (blackout) blush pink.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Soft Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, trinity blackout soft pink adds a gentle touch to your interiors that allows you to transform the look and feel of any room your heart desires. It's all about achieving natural balance so that you can take your decor any which way you please, so go out there and do it. If you want to discover just what you can do with that awkward guest bedroom, soft pink provides the ideal starting point.

products.title: Roma, Hot Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma hot pink is a silky blend of pink and purple that will add some heat and spice to your decor in seconds. If you love to be able to walk into a room and feel the love, this is the fabric you've been waiting a lifetime for. We love the idea of pairing hot pink with smouldering reds and sun-kissed oranges to create a light and vibrant atmosphere you'll never want to leave. Get the balance right and you'll know it when you see it.

products.title: Roma, Rose Tint - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma rose tint is as dusky as it is pretty, and its smoky overtones give this pink blind an extra level of style. Roma's simple fabric hangs flawlessly and without fuss, allowing all your focus to be on the attractive pink tone. Team the rose tint with stark whites to add a contemporary feel to this vintage tone. Bright white walls will make the colour pop, whilst this lovely colour scheme will feel relaxed and cheery in a bedroom, living room, or even kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, the roma primrose is a soft and pretty yellow, steering away from less delicate lemons and mustards into a more subtle and delicate piece. The sweetness of the shade hides a strong and sturdy fabric, useful for the hustle and bustle of busy family life. Go for an unusual but attractive colour scheme in the bathroom by opting for soft yellows and off-whites rather than the usual blues and teals.

products.title: Roma, Tuscan Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma tuscan rose couldn't be better named. Its dusky pink tone is as warm as it is pretty, and the vintage look will appeal to many different tastes. The papery feel of the roma fabric is pleasant to touch, though the material itself is strong and durable. Give a delicate look to a traditional dining room, pairing the tuscan rose with dark, polished woods and palest pink walls. This look would also work well in a guest or master bedroom, or even in the living room for a relaxing atmosphere.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Roller Blind
products.description: The flamingo from the origin (blackout) has nothing if not attitude. This funky fuchsia shade is bold and daring, perfect for brightening up your home. Don't forget though, this blind is more than just good-looking; it's also practical, hardwearing, and easy-to-use. This hot pink shade will sit perfectly against dark purples, pale pinks, or stark whites, and is perfect for a funky bedroom, bright home office, or accented hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a touch of vigour to a dim window with the origin (blackout) in flamingo. This supple blind has a smooth feel and neatly hanging louvres that can be tilted or moved according to how much light you want to let into the room. Make the flamingo stand out by placing in a white bathroom or kitchen, with only colour-coordinated accessories to accent the deep pink colour. Or use in a child's bedroom, amongst baby pinks, soft whites, and contemporary florals.

products.title: Capella, Rose Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Capella in rose gold combines understated minimalism with luxurious finishing to create a homage to floral fabric that will live long in the memory. The way in which the rose gold threads dance with the light is sure to stay with you and inspire you for years to come. Add in some other precious metallic finishes in moderation and you'll be able to continue your luxury theme. The secret is to only deploy them as elegant patterns and prints.

products.title: Delicia, Powder Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Delicia powder pink allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you see it thanks to the faded look of the fabric. This gives it a timeless quality that invites you to sit back and reflect, and to take in the gentle lines as they trace their way across the canvas. Look closer and you come to see how the free-flowing beauty has been achieved through a lack of a constraining black outline.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The stripy pink is a fun way to inject some funky colour and style into any room. But it's far from style over substance; with its high quality blackout material, this blind is the perfect way to ensure a great night's sleep. Why not add the stripy pink to a child's or guest bedroom to give the room a fresh range of vivid colours at minimal cost and effort. Or perhaps add a sense of flair to the kitchen whilst you prepare some of your favourite dishes.

products.title: Blossom, Precious Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of blossom precious pink is the way in which it combines energetic greens and soothing purples to create a picture that connects with your decor. It's more than an addition, it's a starting point. This means you have the freedom to rework your colour scheme safe in the knowledge that you'll love the end result. Take the opportunity to introduce light blues and faded pinks if that's what you feel like doing.

products.title: Cottage Garden, Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at the vibrancy of the reds on display in cottage garden rose, it's easy to forget the beauty of the understated greens. The lack of a black outline allows you to enjoy each colour in relation to its neighbours, and leaves you with an impression of natural simplicity. We love the idea of using garden rose in the upstairs landing so that you can breathe new life into one of the more hard to decorate parts of the home.

products.title: Etching, Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: Etching primrose combines a nuanced look with some life-affirming colours to create a visual that you'll instantly fall in love with. The beauty of it lies in the simplicity, and it's a look we know you'll cherish the moment it lands on your doorstep. If you want to breathe new life into the guest bedroom there's no better way to do it than with a striking fabric that instantly adds something unexpected.

products.title: Emi, Chintz - Roman Blind
products.description: Guaranteed to add floral charm and elegant finesse to a sophisticated dcor, the emi in chintz is made from a relaxed, linen-like fabric, flaunting sweetly designed, blossoming branches in a subtle palette of cream and oatmeal, with quick bursts of cerise. Transform a neutrally toned dining area into a welcoming and stylish haven by adding a delightful print and gentle flurries of colour. Stick to a biscuit or ivory base, adding mocha, cream, and latte tones for an overall soothing ambience, and include cherry red accessories for a coordinated finish.

products.title: Faux Suede, Pastel Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: The suede feel is a must for anyone looking to for softness, luxury, and versatility. This is exactly what the faux suede collection offers, and with the pastel pink edition, you also get a pretty, kitsch colouring to invoke a light and airy feel to any room. The sweet pastel pink will work well when contrasted with bolder, deeper shades in coordinating colours, such as aubergine, fuschia, or tropical pink.

products.title: Sayuri, Chintz - Roman Blind
products.description: The attractive yet functional sayuri in chintz somehow combines both contemporary and traditional looks. The clean colours and the blank canvas have a modern look, whilst the florals are classically styled, resulting in a roman blind that will appeal across the generations. Settle the chinz into your kitchen, amongst matching cream units and natural woods. Use your tablecloth and seat cushions to pull out the dusky, vintage pink and primrose yellow in the blind, and continue this theme across the room.

products.title: Finch Toile, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: In rose pink, soft charcoal grey, and ice white tones, the finch toile rose displays a toile pattern of birds and blossoms, drawn intricately on a dappled background. Made from a high quality cotton fabric, the material sits neatly into the romantic folds of the roman blind. The romantic rose is the perfect fit for a master bedroom where, set against barely there pink walls, matching greys, and accenting whites, it will sit pretty and turn the room into somewhere you'll relish waking up.

products.title: Dotty, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: The delightful dusky pink base to the dotty rose blind is both attractive and charismatic, whilst the nimble and graceful cloth adds a casual and relaxed feel. Complete a refined and pretty look by incorporating this charming polka dot into your home. Form an inviting and attractive kitchen by adding subtle shades of colour and delicate patterns, combining with seafoam green, cornflower blue, and gentle lavender for a kitsch-inspired colour scheme, and glossy white furnishings for a refined and classy finish.

products.title: Flamingos, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: The bright and refreshing light blue of the flamingos in aqua is perfect for brightening up any home. Sweet flamingos, gently drawn in ice whites and candy pinks, skim the water and add colour to this delightful blind. The most obvious place for this water-themed roman blind would be in the bathroom, where it will look stunning against bright white tiles and blue accessories, but a fun alternative might be the guest bedroom, where you can accessorise with varying shades of sky blue and the occasional soft pink too.

products.title: Flamingos, Sand - Roman Blind
products.description: The muted blues and soft salmon pinks in the flamingos sand merge with the sandy beige base to create a truly stunning aesthetic. The flamingos are beautifully drawn, sitting pretty against their softly sketched background. Turn the sand into a sensational piece of artwork by hanging it in the master bedroom, where surrounding it with similarly toned shades of blue and coral will pull out the colours of the blind wonderfully.

products.title: Flamingos, Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned in palest pinks and pretty greys, flamingos pink has a somewhat retro vibe to it, making it the ideal addition to give a contemporary home a little edge. The cotton fabric is high quality and folds neatly into the gentle pleats of the roman blind. Add the pink to the bathroom for an unusual yet appealing look, matching with stone greys and the occasional fuchsia. Alternatively, use it as a feature in a main or guest bedroom, opting for barely there grey walls and baby pink bedding.

products.title: Vw Campervan, Pink - Roman Blind
products.description: Cute and characterful, the vw campervan pink is a charming roman blind, featuring a creamy oatmeal background adorned with fun imagery of campervans in varying colours, with pink as the feature colour. The pink would charm guests in your spare bedroom. Keep the room feeling light and airy, adding in splashes of pink for a real colour pop. If you really love these iconic vehicles, consider a retro wall print to really bring the theme to life.

products.title: Amelie, Tearose - Roman Blind
products.description: Perhaps the most vibrant of the rustic amelie range, the pretty tearose is filled with wispy florals in tropical fuschia, pale coral, and soft grey. The grainy, dark cream backdrop, combined with the hessian-like cloth, adds to the vivid country style of this blind. Embrace a rural and romantic vibe in the master bedroom, using the sweet tearose as your base. Paint the walls in soft cream or baby pink, using chunky wooden furniture with a polished finish.

products.title: Amelie, Primrose - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie in primrose incorporates a delightfully cheerful lemon yellow and a range of wild leafy greens, anchored to a hessian-style background in oatmeal. The end result is a wild country chic, tempered only by the structured cut of the gorgeous roman style. Ditch the traditional turquoise and go for a balmy lemon colour scheme in your bathroom instead. Plump for rustic wooden floors, a roll-top bath, and yellow and cream tiling, choosing towels and bathmats in chalky sage.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Bayham, Primrose - Vista Blind
products.description: Elegant and functional: two words that come to mind when you caste your eye over everything the bayham range has to offer. The warm glow of primrose gently shines through the crisp and clean voile as it hangs effortlessly in your home. Ready for whenever you want to adjust the light levels with ease. Primrose works wonders when you add it to the bedroom in conjunction with gentle blues and greens.

products.title: Daytona, Rose Blush - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In palest pink, the daytona range's rose blush is fresh and welcoming, and this barely-there pink is ideal for adding colour without overwhelming a room. As a bonus, the high quality faux wood of the shutter is moisture-resistant, so whether you hang it in the bedroom or the bathroom, you get long-lasting durability. Use the rose blush in the nursery for a serene and relaxing ambience that you'll want to spend all day in.
